entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy near noon with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
